mapper.select: select boardname from all_product where companyid = #{companyid} and category = #{category} and category2 =#{category2} and FLAVOR = #{flavor}

SELECT r.*, a.*, ap.boardname FROM review r LEFT JOIN ( SELECT allimg.*, min_allimg.min_num FROM allimg JOIN ( SELECT notifynum, MIN(num) AS min_num FROM allimg WHERE type = 4 GROUP BY notifynum ) min_allimg ON allimg.notifynum = min_allimg.notifynum AND allimg.num = min_allimg.min_num ) a ON r.num = a.notifynum LEFT JOIN all_product ap ON r.companyid = ap.companyid AND r.category = ap.category AND r.category2 = ap.category2 AND r.flavor = ap.flavor ORDER BY r.num ASC
mapper.insert: insert into review (num, companyid, category, category2, flavor, id, writer, starscore,content,isfile,reg) values (review_seq.nextval, #{companyid}, #{category}, #{category2}, #{flavor}, #{id}, #{writer}, #{starscore}, #{content}, #{isfile}, sysdate)

select review_seq.CURRVAL as notifynum from dual
insert into allimg (num, id, type, notifynum, attatch) values(allimg_SEQ.nextval, #{id}, 4, #{notifynum}, #{attatch})
